question: I'm an SAP consultant wanting to transition to SAP Solution Architect role

available_agents.description: SAP Research specialist for gathering SAP-specific career information
SAP Career analysis specialist for SAP employee profiles and trajectories
SAP Career integration specialist for comprehensive SAP career guidance

analysis: SAP career transition requires comprehensive research, analysis, and strategic planning. Each agent should provide complete coverage in single calls to optimize efficiency.

plan.task: Research SAP Solution Architect certification requirements, career progression, current salary ranges, and job market demand for SAP architects - provide comprehensive market intelligence covering all aspects
